header.title: Toten Transport Lithuania - Logistics company for you.
header.description: Partial and full freight transportation between Lithuania and Scandinavia countrys (Norway, Sweden and Finland). Toten Transport Lithuania is part of Toten transport AS.

index.firstText: Partial and full freight transportation between Lithuania and Sweden, Norway and Finland
index.secondText: We also provide warehousing, terminal, and customs brokerage services

about.firstText: Lithuanian-Norwegian logistics services company . Operating in Kaunas since year 2000. Member of Norwegian group Toten Transport AS. The main activity is transportation of small, partial and full loads by road transport to Scandinavian and Baltic countries. We are a member of Lithuanian National Freight Forwarders Association LINEKA. Civil liability is insured under Lithuanian Freight Forwarders General Freight Forwarding Conditions LEBES - Conforms to Nordic Freight Forwarding Conditions NSAB 2015. The company's vehicles are equipped with cargo tracking equipment, we can quickly provide information about the cargo being transported and the location of the machine.
about.secondText: Every order and every customer is important to us!
about.totenText: From 2017 UAB Nordcarrier Baltic is part of Norwegian logistics group TOTEN TRANSPORT AS.
about.totenText2: The group has been operating in the market for more than 40 years, is well known and appreciated in Scandinavia, and is also expanding its activities in the Baltic countries.

features.featureText: Nordcarrier Baltic was established in 2000. Since 2017 we are part of Toten Transport group.
Departures 1-2 times per week. Departures to north Norway 1 time per week.
Customs paperwork services in Lithuania and Norway.
Terminal services in Kaunas and Norway.

contacts.name: Regular partial and full freight transportation from Lithuania to Sweden, Norway.
Regular partial and full freight transportation from Sweden, Norway to Lithuania.
Other directions. Oversized load, special loads.
Regular partial and full freight transportation to Finland, ferry tickets.
Relations with haulers, marketing, special projects.
